data.title: Paul Scheer and June Diane Raphael Welcome a Son
data.meta_description: Paul Scheer and June Diane Raphael Welcome Second Son
data.text:
They’re a family of four!

Paul Scheer and June Diane Raphael welcomed their second son together earlier this week, the actress’ rep confirms to PEOPLE exclusively.

“We are so excited to welcome our new baby©. He’s© available for all endorsements and sponsorships,” the couple jokes in a statement.

The Grace & Frankie actress and the Fresh Off the Boat co-creator began dating in 2004 and wed in fall 2009 at the Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History. The comedians welcomed their first son, Gus, in May 2014.

Want all the latest pregnancy and birth announcements, plus celebrity mom blogs? Click here to get those and more in the PEOPLE Babies newsletter.

Last week, the actress proudly showed off her baby bump on Instagram.

“Do u guys ever have the feeling of being inspired by yourself? I do. Here I go looking right and tight at 39 weeks for an amazing cause! @michaeljfoxorg,” she captioned the photo.

“We are currently investigating who did this, we won’t stop till we find the father. Any help the public can provide would be greatly appreciated,” they joked about their pregnancy earlier this year.

Looks like the mystery’s been solved!

— Melody Chiu
